marketing.hero.title: Design, launch, and scale customer journeys without code
marketing.hero.subtitle: SaaSwift centralises analytics, automation, and collaboration so your team launches experiments 5× faster—without switching tools.
marketing.hero.previewDescription: Launch interactive onboarding flows powered by your product data and AI-generated playbooks.

marketing.hero.cards.ai.description: Generate activation experiments tailored to every cohort.

marketing.features.label: Platform
marketing.features.title: Everything your go-to-market teams need in one place
marketing.features.subtitle: Automate repetitive work, align teams with shared insights, and move from idea to shipped experiment before your competitors.
marketing.features.analytics.title: Unified analytics
marketing.features.analytics.description: Blend product, revenue, and marketing signals into a real-time control centre.
marketing.features.automation.title: Journeys automation
marketing.features.automation.descriptio: Trigger hyper-personalised emails, in-app nudges, and lifecycle ads with zero engineering effort.
marketing.features.collaboration.title: Team workspace
marketing.features.collaboration.descrip: Collaborate with sales, success, and product using shared briefs, notes, and approvals.
marketing.features.security.title: Enterprise security
marketing.features.security.description: SOC 2 Type II compliant with SSO, audit trails, and granular roles out-of-the-box.
marketing.pricing.label: Pricing
marketing.pricing.title: Choose a plan that grows with your team
marketing.pricing.subtitle: Simple pricing that scales as you activate more customers. Upgrade or downgrade any time.
marketing.pricing.starter.description: Perfect for early-stage teams launching their first experiments.
marketing.pricing.growth.description: Advanced automation, deeper integrations, and dedicated success guidance.
marketing.testimonials.label: Social proof
marketing.testimonials.title: Teams ship faster with SaaSwift
marketing.testimonials.0.quote: We launched three onboarding flows in a week and doubled trial conversions within the quarter.
marketing.testimonials.0.author: Aisha Bello
marketing.testimonials.1.quote: The automation canvas replaced four tools and gave our product and marketing teams a single source of truth.
marketing.testimonials.1.author: Luis Fernández
